title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 82-2.10 - Demand for public hearing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 82-2.10 - Demand for public hearing

State Regulations

Unless the employee or his or her attorney shall have
served a written demand for a public hearing upon the chairperson of the panel
or if no chairperson of the panel has yet been designated, upon the
commissioner, at least five days before the date set for the hearing, the
employee will be deemed to have waived his or her right to a public hearing and
the hearing will be private. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
82-2.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
